titles.title: Legal Services Benefit Act of 2009
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore, increase, and make permanent the exclusion from gross income for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/2/2009--Introduced. Legal Services Benefit Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to restore, increase, and make permanent the exclusion from gross income for amounts received under qualified group legal services plans.
